Atlantean.name: Atlantean
Atlantean.description: The character can breath under water and its swimming speed is equal to its normal speed +2m/AP

Alzawahif.name: Alzawahif
Alzawahif.description: The character skin becomes invisible when it stops moving

Isbjorn.name: Isbjorn
Isbjorn.description: The character heals for 1 HP per turn

Raiz.name: Raiz
Raiz.description: The character can communicate with the fauna and the flora

Kanshojin.name: Kanshojin
Kanshojin.description: The character can fly with its normal speed

Caniae.name: Caniae
Caniae.description: The character has a very developed sense of smell, allowing him to remember smells perfectly and to trace them. (+3 in checks where odor occurs)

Waniama.name: Waniama
Waniama.description: The character has +2m/AP to its normal speed

Ukher.name: Ukher
Ukher.description: The character becomes enraged when he is below 50% of his max HP, granting him +1 AP regeneration.

Undead.name: Undead
Undead.description:
Radiant healing hurt the character but necrotic damage heal it.
The character is weak to blunt damage and resistant against piercing damage.
The character is immune to all constitution save but it has disadvantage against mental effects saves.
The character health is base on its resilience
